• Holder’s Inequality:
    If X Y and Z are random variables on Ω, and p, q > 1 with 1/p + 1/q = 1,

• Holder’s Inequality:
    • Additional Properties of Conditional Expectation
    • E[Xg(Y )|Y ] = g(Y )E[X|Y ]
    • E[E[X|Y , Z]|Y ] = E[X|Y ]
    • E[X|Y ] = X, if X = g(Y ) for some g
    • E[h(X, Y )|Y = y] = E[h(X, y)]
    • E[X|Y ] = E[X], if X and Y are independent
